lines: 1. The golden morning is fast approaching; Jesus soon will come To take His faithful and happy children To their promised home.
Refrain : O, we see the gleams of the golden morning Piercing through this night of gloom! O, we see the gleams of the golden morning That will burst the tomb.
2. The gospel summons will soon be carried To the nations round The Bridegroom then will cease to tarry And the trumpet sound.
3. Attended by all the shining angels, Down the flaming sky The Judge will come, and will take His people Where they will not die.
4. There those loved ones who have long been parted, Will all meet that day; The tears of those who are brokenhearted Will be wiped away.
